Live Briefing: U.S. and allies seek to guide Syrian transition in flurry of diplomacy
content: Several high-level visits come as Syrian rebel groups try to establish a new government in the wake of the collapse of the Bashar al-Assad regime.
summary: Several high-level visits come as Syrian rebel groups try to establish a new government in the wake of the collapse of the Bashar al-Assad regime.

title: Assad lived in quiet luxury while Syrians went hungry
content: Syria’s ousted leader cultivated a modest image. Footage revealing hidden opulence tells a different story.
summary: Syria’s ousted leader cultivated a modest image. Footage revealing hidden opulence tells a different story.

title: After Assad’s demise, Turkey is emerging a winner in Syria
content: Turkey is emerging as the outside power with the strongest hand in steering Syria’s political transition.
summary: Turkey is emerging as the outside power with the strongest hand in steering Syria’s political transition.

title: In Britain, the prime minister and his foes spar over sandwiches
content: Leaders of the U.K.’s biggest political parties are arguing over whether sandwiches are a waste of bread or a cultural treasure.
summary: Leaders of the U.K.’s biggest political parties are arguing over whether sandwiches are a waste of bread or a cultural treasure.

title: U.S. diplomats in region push Gaza ceasefire deal, Syrian transition
content: National security adviser Jake Sullivan said the Biden administration has had “coordination and consultation” with the incoming Trump administration on Middle East diplomatic efforts.
summary: National security adviser Jake Sullivan said the Biden administration has had “coordination and consultation” with the incoming Trump administration on Middle East diplomatic efforts.

title: Blinken in Mideast to discuss Syrian transition as Hamas softens Gaza ceasefire demands
content: The top U.S. diplomat will meet with regional leaders to emphasize U.S. support for a Syrian-led transition to “an accountable and representative government.”
summary: The top U.S. diplomat will meet with regional leaders to emphasize U.S. support for a Syrian-led transition to “an accountable and representative government.”

title: Blinken visits Jordan and Turkey amid Syrian political uncertainty
Syrian rebels offer to help U.S. search for journalist Austin Tice
content: U.S. officials say that, for now, it is too dangerous to deploy personnel to look for Austin Tice, who was abducted near Damascus 12 years ago.
summary: U.S. officials say that, for now, it is too dangerous to deploy personnel to look for Austin Tice, who was abducted near Damascus 12 years ago.

title: Assad’s collapse triggers race to find missing chemical weapons
content: The Assad regime hid some of its deadly nerve agents from inspectors. With Syria in chaos, finding out what happened to the arsenal is a top priority.
summary: The Assad regime hid some of its deadly nerve agents from inspectors. With Syria in chaos, finding out what happened to the arsenal is a top priority.

title: U.S. citizen found in Syria says he was imprisoned for months
content: The man, who identified himself as Travis Timmerman, said he had crossed into Syria from neighboring Lebanon months ago on a “pilgrimage” to Damascus.
summary: The man, who identified himself as Travis Timmerman, said he had crossed into Syria from neighboring Lebanon months ago on a “pilgrimage” to Damascus.

title: How Israel used a power vacuum to destroy Syria’s military assets
content: The goal, said Avi Dichter, an Israeli minister, “is to establish facts on the ground” as Islamist rebels seek to cement their rule over the fractured country.

Assad’s fall humiliated Putin and could dent his global ambitions
content: Assad’s fall nine years after Russia saved his regime is a stunning blow to Putin’s goal of forging Russia into a world power to compete with the United States.
summary: Assad’s fall nine years after Russia saved his regime is a stunning blow to Putin’s goal of forging Russia into a world power to compete with the United States.

title: Power vacuum in South Korea, a key U.S. ally, raises security concerns
content: The political paralysis could be particularly destabilizing as South Korea prepares for a Trump White House and renewed scrutiny of the alliance, analysts say.
summary: The political paralysis could be particularly destabilizing as South Korea prepares for a Trump White House and renewed scrutiny of the alliance, analysts say.

title: IDF strikes kill 15 people trying to guard aid convoys in Gaza, Civil Defense says
Australia to tackle Chinese influence with Papua New Guinean rugby team
content: A team from the Pacific nation will join Australia’s National Rugby League in a $400 million deal that deepens ties while denting China’s regional security push.
summary: A team from the Pacific nation will join Australia’s National Rugby League in a $400 million deal that deepens ties while denting China’s regional security push.

title: He thought he had escaped Beijing’s clutches only to vanish back into China
content: The secret repatriation of a Uyghur man shows China’s long reach, especially against Uyghur Muslims, whom the U.S. says are targets of an ongoing genocide.
summary: The secret repatriation of a Uyghur man shows China’s long reach, especially against Uyghur Muslims, whom the U.S. says are targets of an ongoing genocide.

After Assad flees to Moscow, a look at how other dictators lived in exile
content: Uganda’s Idi Amin shocked the world with atrocities, then fled with his wives to a quiet middle-class life. The Philippines’ Ferdinand Marcos lived in luxury in Hawaii.
summary: Uganda’s Idi Amin shocked the world with atrocities, then fled with his wives to a quiet middle-class life. The Philippines’ Ferdinand Marcos lived in luxury in Hawaii.

title: Data shows global conflict surged in 2024
content: Conflicts have doubled over five years, according to a report published by Armed Conflict Location & Event Data.
summary: Conflicts have doubled over five years, according to a report published by Armed Conflict Location & Event Data.

title: 11-year-old girl survives 3 days at sea by clinging to tire inner tubes
content: The girl from Sierra Leone was the sole survivor of a shipwreck off Italy’s Lampedusa island, rescuers said. Dozens of migrants likely died when their boat sank in a storm.
summary: The girl from Sierra Leone was the sole survivor of a shipwreck off Italy’s Lampedusa island, rescuers said. Dozens of migrants likely died when their boat sank in a storm.

title: South Korean president defends martial law decree, defies pressure to quit
content: The opposition is pressing ahead with a second attempt to impeach Yoon Suk Yeol, and there are signs some members of the president’s party will support his ouster.
summary: The opposition is pressing ahead with a second attempt to impeach Yoon Suk Yeol, and there are signs some members of the president’s party will support his ouster.

title: Syrian rebel forces dismantle symbols of al-Assad
content: Rebel forces led by Hayat Tahrir al-Sham said they took control of Deir al-Zour in eastern Syria. Israel said its extensive strikes were to prevent a future attack.
summary: Rebel forces led by Hayat Tahrir al-Sham said they took control of Deir al-Zour in eastern Syria. Israel said its extensive strikes were to prevent a future attack.

title: After toppling Assad, can Syria’s rebels rebuild a shattered state?
content: Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, the leading rebel force, must work to allay public fears that it will seek to replace Assadism with its own form of absolute rule.

title: Tycoon Adani pulls request for U.S. loan to finance strategic Sri Lanka port

title: Who is Kim Guilfoyle? Trump taps ex-Fox News host, lawyer as ambassador to Greece.

title: These preteen go-kart drivers are spending millions for a shot at F1 racing
content: Parents are spending millions on karting for their kids, hoping it will eventually catapult them into F1 racing. It’s a mad, mad world. And we go inside.

title: Australian leader decries hate crimes after another antisemitic attack
content: Australian politicians are warning against “importing conflicts” after the second antisemitic attack in a week. The incidents have shaken the Jewish community.
